inducements.name: Prayers to Nuffle
inducements.description: Roll a D16 (re-rolling duplicates) and consult the Prayers to Nuffle table for effects lasting until the end of the match.

inducements.name: Temp Agency Cheerleaders
inducements.description: Increases the number of Cheerleaders on your team by 1 per purchase for this match only.

inducements.name: Part-time Assistant Coaches
inducements.description: Increases the number of Assistant Coaches on your team by 1 per purchase for this match only.

inducements.name: Team Mascot
inducements.description: Grants one additional team re-roll that can only be used on a D6 roll of 4+ (on 1-3, the re-roll is lost). Also allows re-rolling any 1s when rolling on the Cheering Fans table.

inducements.name: Weather Mage
inducements.description: Once per match, the Weather Mage can roll on the Weather table with a +2 or -2 modifier of your choice.

inducements.name: Blitzer's Best Kegs
inducements.description: Provides a +1 modifier when rolling to recover KO'd players.

inducements.name: Canopic Jar
inducements.description: At the start of each drive, roll a D6 for one of six different effects (curses or blessings) that last until the end of the drive.

inducements.name: Bribes
inducements.description: When a player is Sent-off, roll a D6. On a 2+, the player is not Sent-off. A natural 1 always fails. Each Bribe can only be used once.

inducements.name: Extra Team Training
inducements.description: Grants one additional team re-roll for the duration of the match.

inducements.name: Wandering Apothecary
inducements.description: Works exactly like a team Apothecary and can be used once per match. Only available to teams that can hire an Apothecary.

inducements.name: Bretonnian Pastries
inducements.description: At the end of each drive, roll a D6 for one KO'd player. On a 2+, the player goes to Reserves. On a 1, nothing happens.

inducements.name: Bretonnian Damsel
inducements.description: Once per match, the Damsel may cast either the Zap! spell or the High Winds spell.

inducements.name: Mercenary Player
inducements.description: Hire a player from another team's roster at their base cost +30,000 gold. The Mercenary gains the Loner (4+) trait. Team cannot exceed 16 players.

inducements.name: Star Player
inducements.description: Hire a Star Player at their listed cost. Team cannot exceed 16 players total. Star Players cannot earn SPP or be awarded MVP.

inducements.name: Mortuary Assistant
inducements.description: Once per match, you may re-roll a failed Regeneration roll for one of your players.

inducements.name: Plague Doctor
inducements.description: Once per match, you may either re-roll a failed Regeneration roll OR use as an Apothecary.

inducements.name: Riotous Rookies
inducements.description: After setting up your team with 11 players (using Journeymen if needed), roll 2D3+1 for additional Journeymen. Available to teams with Linemen costing 50,000 or less.

inducements.name: Halfling Master Chef
inducements.description: At the start of each half, roll 3D6. For each 4+, gain +1 team re-roll and the opposing team loses 1 team re-roll (to a minimum of 0).

inducements.name: Josef Bugman
inducements.description: Infamous Coaching Staff. Josef provides Bugman's XXXXXX ale which grants special bonuses to the team.

inducements.name: Sports-Wizard
inducements.description: Once per match, the Wizard may cast one of their available spells: Fireball or Zap!

inducements.name: Dodgy League Rep
inducements.description: Biased Referee who can be convinced to look the other way. Provides benefits when fouling and protection against Send-offs.
